name: England
info: Constituent country of the United Kingdom.

name: Scotland
info: Constituent country of the United Kingdom.

name: Northern Ireland
info: Constituent country of the United Kingdom.

name: Wales
info: Constituent country of the United Kingdom.

name: Greenland
info: Constituent country in the Kingdom of Denmark.

name: Czech Republic
info: Also known as Czechia.

name: Faroe Islands
info: Constituent country in the Kingdom of Denmark.

name: North Macedonia
info: Formerly known as Macedonia.

name: Netherlands
capitalInfo: While Amsterdam is the official capital, The Hague is the seat of the executive and legislative branches.

name: Switzerland
capitalInfo: Switzerland has no official capital; Bern is the de facto capital.

name: Turkey
info: Also known as Türkiye

name: Benin
capitalInfo: While Porto-Novo is the official capital, Cotonou is the de facto seat of government.

name: Burundi
capitalInfo: Official capital was moved from Bujumbura to Gitega in 2019.

name: Cape Verde
info: Also known as Cabo Verde.

name: Equatorial Guinea
capitalInfo: Ciudad de la Paz is being built to replace Malabo as capital.

name: Ivory Coast
info: Officially Côte d'Ivoire.
capitalInfo: While Yamoussoukro is the official capital, Abidjan is the de facto seat of government.

name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
info: Formerly Zaire.

name: South Africa
capitalInfo: South Africa has no legally defined capital: the branches of government are split over three cities: Pretoria (executive), Cape Town (legislative) and Bloemfontein (judicial).

name: Eswatini
info: Known as Swaziland until 2018.
capitalInfo: While Mbabane is the official, executive capital, Lobamba is the traditional, spiritual and legislative capital.

name: Tanzania
capitalInfo: While Dodoma is the official capital, Dar es Salaam is the de facto seat of government.

name: Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
info: Partially recognised state claimed by Morocco. Also known as Western Sahara.
capitalInfo: While Laayoune, also known as El Aaiún, is the declared capital, Tifariti is the de facto seat of government.

name: Canary Islands
info: Autonomous community of Spain.

name: Hong Kong
info: Special Administrative Region of China.

name: Myanmar
info: Also known as Burma.

name: Palestine
capitalInfo: Disputed; claimed by Israel; Ramallah is the administrative centre.

name: Taiwan
info: Partially recognised state claimed by China.

name: Sri Lanka
capitalInfo: Colombo is often referred to as the capital but Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte, a suburb of Colombo, is the official, legislative capital.

name: East Timor
info: Also known as Timor-Leste.

name: Bolivia
capitalInfo: While Sucre is the constitutional capital, La Paz is the seat of government.

name: Guam
info: Unincorporated territory of the United States.

name: Puerto Rico
info: Unincorporated territory of the United States.

name: Bermuda
info: Overseas territory of the United Kingdom.

name: Guadeloupe

name: Zanzibar

name: Nauru

name: Gulf of Thailand

name: Sea of Japan
info: A naming dispute exists between the sea's bordering countries, with South Korea notably supporting the name East Sea.

name: Gulf of California
info: Also known as the Sea of Cortez.

name: Polynesia
info: Subregion of Oceania comprising thousands of small islands in the central and southern Pacific Ocean.

name: Melanesia
info: Subregion of Oceania, which includes the four countries of Vanuatu, the Solomon Islands, Fiji, and Papua New Guinea.

name: Scandinavia
info: Historical and cultural region in Northern Europe, which includes the countries of Denmark, Norway and Sweden, and sometimes Finland and Iceland.
